Class MakeCoffeeStepDefs

extends java.lang.Object
    StepDefs (Cucumber) for Making Coffee.
    Author:
    Kai Presler-Marshall, Sarah Elder

    • Method Detail

      • initialInventory

        @Given(value="^(\\d+) coffee, (\\d+) milk, (\\d+) sugar, and (\\d+) chocolate currently in the CoffeeMaker$")
public void initialInventory(int originalCoffee,
                                                                                                                                            int originalMilk,
                                                                                                                                            int originalSugar,
                                                                                                                                            int originalChocolate)
        Sets the CoffeeMaker's Inventory to contain the ingredients specified here.
        Parameters:
        originalCoffee - The amount of Coffee to set the Inventory to.
        originalMilk - The amount of Milk to set the Inventory to.
        originalSugar - The amount of Sugar to set the Inventory to.
        originalChocolate - The amount of Chocolate to set the Inventory to.

      • removeInventoryHelper

        public void removeInventoryHelper(int removeCoffee,
                                  int removeMilk,
                                  int removeSugar,
                                  int removeChocolate)
        The CoffeeMaker has no (direct) way to remove ingredients from the Inventory it stores, this allows us to effectively do so by creating a recipe with the amount of ingredients to remove, and then making coffee with the Recipe just created
        Parameters:
        removeCoffee - Amount of Coffee to remove from the Inventory
        removeMilk - Amount of Milk to remove from the Inventory
        removeSugar - Amount of Sugar to remove from the Inventory
        removeChocolate - Amount of Chocolate to remove from the Inventory

      • existingRecipes

        @Given(value="^the CoffeeMaker has (\\d+) Recipes$")
public void existingRecipes(int numRecipes)
                                                                           throws java.lang.Exception
        Deletes the existing batch of recipies in the CoffeeMaker and then populates it with a new batch of Recipies.
        Parameters:
        numRecipes - The number of recipies that should be in the RecipeBook
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - If the number of recipies to add is greater than the max allowed

      • addSpecificRecipe

        @When(value="^I submit values for name: (.+); cost: (\\d+); and ingredients: (\\d+) coffee, (\\d+) milk, (\\d+) sugar, (\\d+) chocolate$")
public void addSpecificRecipe(java.lang.String name,
                                                                                                                                                                          int cost,
                                                                                                                                                                          int coffeeAmt,
                                                                                                                                                                          int milkAmt,
                                                                                                                                                                          int sugarAmt,
                                                                                                                                                                          int chocolateAmt)
        Creates a new Recipe for the COffeeMaker using the parameters specified.
        Parameters:
        name - Name of the new Recipe
        cost - Cost of the new Recipe
        coffeeAmt - Amount of Coffee to be used by the new Recipe
        milkAmt - Amount of Milk to be used by the new Recipe
        sugarAmt - Amount of Sugar to be used by the new Recipe
        chocolateAmt - Amount of Chocolate to be used by the new Recipe

      • validMakeCoffee

        @When(value="^I make coffee with the recipe for (.+) and input (.+) money$")
public void validMakeCoffee(java.lang.String recipeName,
                                                                                                          java.lang.String sMoney)
        Execute the CoffeeMaker's MakeCoffee action with the name of the recipe specified and the amount of money paid.
        Parameters:
        recipeName - Name of the recipe to use for making Coffee
        sMoney - Amount of money that is paid

      • validMakeCoffeeResult

        @Then(value="^the coffee is successfully made with correct change$")
public void validMakeCoffeeResult()
        Ensure that the coffee was successfully made and the change given was the correct amount for the recipe price and the amount paid

      • invalidMakeCoffeeResult

        @Then(value="^the coffee maker returns your money$")
public void invalidMakeCoffeeResult()
        Ensure that if the CoffeeMaker failed to make coffee properly that all of the money provided was returned as change
